questions.title: Course Preferences
questions.instruction: Choose the correct letter, A, B or C.

questions.title: Course Requirements and Payment
questions.instruction: Answer the questions below. Write NO MORE THAN THREE WORDS AND/OR A NUMBER for each answer.

questions.text: What does John need to bring to the first class?
How much is the course fee?
What is the deadline for payment?

questions.title: Course Overview
questions.instruction: Complete the sentences. Write NO MORE THAN TWO WORDS AND/OR A NUMBER for each answer.

questions.text: The Web Development course is designed for {BLANK:6} who want to learn how to create websites.
The course covers topics such as HTML, CSS, and {BLANK:7}.
Students will work on {BLANK:8} projects throughout the course to gain practical experience.

options.text: They do not contain any organic matter.
They are found in soft, wet ground.

questions.title: Climate Change Effects
questions.instruction: Answer the questions below. Write NO MORE THAN THREE WORDS AND/OR A NUMBER for each answer.

questions.text: What is the predicted global temperature rise by 2100?
Which ecosystem is most at risk from rising sea levels?
What percentage of species are at risk of extinction due to climate change?

questions.title: Renewable Energy
